member.name: M:Joked.Controllers.JokesController.GetJokes(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Display curated list of jokes for a search term
member.remarks: Accept a search term and display the first 30 jokes containing that term, with the matching term emphasized in some way (upper, bold, color, etc.) and the matching jokes grouped by length: short (<10 words), medium (<20 words), long (<= 20 words) https://icanhazdadjoke.com/api

member.name: M:Joked.Controllers.JokesController.GetCuratedJokes(System.String)
member.summary: Display curated list of jokes for a search term
member.remarks: Accept a search term and display the first 30 jokes containing that term, with the matching term emphasized in some way (upper, bold, color, etc.) and the matching jokes grouped by length: short (<10 words), medium (<20 words), long (<= 20 words) https://icanhazdadjoke.com/api
